name: Hog Hunter 2021
description:
You've just recently been approved for your license, its time to hunt some hogs!

Explore two local forests and claim your prey in this stylized retro looking game, be careful though as not everything in the woods is safe...

Features:
  • Thirty minutes of total content, designed to be a short experience.

  • Stealth mechanics to better approach prey.

  • Stylized graphics for an immersive experience.

  • Four endings based on what you see and do.
